result.html: Sheas siad ina thimpeallThey stood around him.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeas siad ina ṫimpeallThey stood around him.

result.ga: Sheas sé an fód go cróga
result.orig: Sheas sé an fód go cróga
result.html: Sheas sé an fód go crógaHe stood his ground bravely.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeas sé an fód go crógaHe stood his ground bravely.

result.eng: She stood before me in the queue.
result.html: Sheas sí romham sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeas sí roṁam sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.

result.eng: I stood in the middle of the bridge.
result.ga: Sheas mé i lár an droichid
result.orig: Sheas mé i lár an droichid
result.html: Sheas mé i lár an droichidI stood in the middle of the bridge.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeas mé i lár an droiċidI stood in the middle of the bridge.

result.eng: Jamie stood leaning against a corner.
result.ga: Sheasaigh Séimí agus a thaca le coirnéal
result.orig: Sheasaigh Séimí agus a thaca le coirnéal
